blogs.title: M.ETA Officially Launches HUYỀN HOÀNG Product Line
blogs.description: A new step in the journey of telling history through experience. M.ETA marks its first milestone with a project connected to real heritage.

blogs.title: What is HUYỀN HOÀNG in M.ETA's World?
blogs.description: HUYỀN HOÀNG is the first project M.ETA uses to answer its big question. Whether Vietnamese history can be retold through experience.

blogs.title: M.ETA and the Question: What Do Young People Need from History?
blogs.description: We don't try to teach history. M.ETA creates experiences compelling enough for young people to actively want to learn.
